Message:
“Great Hero, are you alright?
If there’s anything
I can do to help...

Oh, you’re here too, Elaine.
Hmph, some nun you are,
sneaking ahead to tend
to the Hero first...”

“Elaine...what did you just do...?
Why did you stab him...
in the heart...?
Just what the hell are you doing?!”

Elaine turned towards me,
the look on her face sending
chills down my spine.

She just killed
the Hero of the Staff—
the one she loved—
with her own hands.

How could she have that gentle
smile spread across her face...?

Then Elaine vanished
without a trace,
taking the Hero’s body with her.

I wanted to chase after her,
but the others said the mission
had to take priority.

“Our journey to vanquish
the demons and save the world
is far from over,” they explained.

How can I even think about
doing that when she killed
the Hero in cold blood?!

And yet, you say we still
have to save the world,
even if it means letting
that murderer get away?!”

We then opened a new “door.”
But, with our hearts divided,
it crumbled to pieces,
and we were flung
into an endless void.
